tool_description: The fastest way to generate your own ERC20 tokens on Matic Network
name: generate-erc20
title: generate-erc20

api_list.name: Mint ERC20 Token
api_list.description: Mints A New ERC20 Token On Matic Network
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://generate-erc20.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "generate-erc20.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://generate-erc20.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "generate-erc20.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
